Wiz

A high-level assembly language for retro console platforms.

Get Started

Familiar Syntax

Familiar high-level syntax and structured programming features.

Static Typing

Supports automatic type inference for initializers.

Low-level Control

Expressions and statements that map directly to low-level instructions.

Raw hardware access

Low-level register and memory access, branching, stack, etc.

Compile-time features

Attributes, inlining, constant expression folding and more.

Multiple Systems

Support for multiple different systems and output file formats.
